OTHER_NAMES: [ROBERT WAY GRIFFITH, ROBERT WAYNE GRIFFITH, ROBERT W WEISS]
DISCLOSURE_INFO:
{
  "Allegations" : "The client surrendered his American National Variable Annuity and is upset over the taxes he owes on the realized gains. The client alleges the representative did not advise him on how to properly reinvest the money he received and on the taxes he would incur as a result of the surrender.",
  "Damage Amount Requested" : "$18,543.00",
  "Damages Granted" : "$11,043.00",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "Y",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "17-00503",
  "Broker Comment" : "The representative denies the allegations that the client was not informed of the taxes he would incur on the annuity surrender. The client worked directly with American National to surrender the annuity and elected to not withhold taxes. In addition, the representative feels he provided options to the client for reinvestment of the funds and that the client did not agree with those options. The respondents are jointly and severally liable for and shall pay to the claimant the sum of $11,043.00 in compensatory damages and interest at the rate of 6% per annum from April 1, 2016 through and including the date of the award."
}

DISCLOSURE_INFO:
{
  "Allegations" : "CLIENT IS ALLEGING THAT THE VARIABLE LIFE POLICY SHE PURCHASED WAS NOT SUITABLE BASED ON HER FINANCIAL SITUATION.  SHE IS ALSO ALLEGING THAT THE SURRENDER CHARGES AND FEATURES OF THE POLICY WERE NOT ACCURATELY EXPLAINED TO HER.  SHE IS REQUESTING A REFUND OF ALL PREMIUMS PAID.",
  "Damage Amount Requested" : "$5,100.00",
  "DisplayAAOLinkIfExists" : "N",
  "arbitrationClaimFiledDetail" : "",
  "arbitrationDocketNumber" : "",
  "Broker Comment" : "AFTER A THOROUGH INVESTIGATION INTO THE CLIENT'S ALLEGATIONS, IT WAS DETERMINED THAT SHE WAS PROVIDED WITH ADEQUATE EXPLANATION AND DISCLOSURE OF THE FEATURES AND BENEFITS OF THE POLICY SHE WAS PURCHASING.  NO EVIDENCE THAT THE POLICY WAS UNSUITABLE WAS FOUND.  THEREFORE, THE COMPLAINT WAS DENIED."
}
